alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 7:56PM EDT until August 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Niceville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Oakwood Hills, Portland, Pleasant Ridge, Alpine Heights, New Home, De Funiak Spring Airport and Mossy Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
